long p_align
 The alignment the segment should have in memory.

Detailed Description

Defines an entry in the ELF program header table.

Each entry corresponds to a segment.

Definition at line 188 of file kernel.h.

Field Documentation

long Elf64_Phdr::p_align

The alignment the segment should have in memory.

This field is currently being ignored.
